name: Beeswing
summary: Beeswing is a game set in a small village in rural Scotland, the village I grew up in. Visit the places and people who shaped a life and discover their stories. Represented in hand painted, water colour graphics with a unique, acoustic soundtrack.
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: AVG
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2014/12/10
  • 售价: $4.99
